about_the_game:
Bounteous Bundle

Who knows just how long our Survivors will be trapped in the Constant - why not make the most of it? Adventure in style with this bundle, packed to the brim with tools, weapons, armor and belongings to beautify your base. Everything you’ll need to survive and thrive!

Includes
  • Survivalist Campfire
  • Roman Wood Armor
  • Nordic Spear
  • Nordic Pickaxe
  • Nordic Axe
  • Nordic Shovel
  • Carrat Pack
  • Basket Trap
  • Nordic Battle Spear
  • Flamboyant Fan
  • Corrupted Blade
  • Corrupted Cloak
  • Corrupted Cane
  • Arcane Headpiece
  • Clockwork Deconstruction Staff
  • Ornate Nordic Axe
  • Ornate Nordic Pickaxe
  • Ornate Nordic Shovel
  • Piggy Backpack
  • Home Sweet Home
  • Ancient Sigil
  • Lilycap Light
  • Nouveau Mushlamp
  • Butcher's Rack
  • Baroque Birdcage
  • Thatched Cottage
  • Carrat Cottage
  • Terracotta Cooking Pot
  • Clawfoot Furnace
  • White Picket Fence
  • White Garden Gate
  • White Address Plaque
  • Walnut Garden Fence
  • Walnut Picket Gate
  • Walnut Address Plaque
  • Ash Garden Fence
  • Ash Picket Gate
  • Ash Address Plaque

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
